title: Content
description: Understand how to create structured content sections.

meta.title: LNGRZUI | Content Documentation
meta.description: Understand how to create structured content sections.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Content page features the Content component, which helps you structure and style your page content effectively.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Content component, and include the desired content as the child of the Content. Customize the appearance of the content using the provided props.
